channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Eurovision 2024: Here are the songs with the best shot at glory
item.description: Another year, another glitter-filled spectacle known as the Eurovision Song Contest. The Grand Final airs Saturday at 3:00 p.m. ET on Peacock in the United States.
item.content:encoded:
Another year, another glitter-filled spectacle known as the Eurovision Song Contest. The Grand Final airs Saturday at 3:00 p.m. ET on Peacock in the United States.

(Image credit: Jessica Gow)
item.dc:creator: Glen Weldon

item.title: A Foiled Assassination Plot in Ukraine; Russia Marks World War II Victory
item.description:
Ukraine uncovers what they say was a sophisticated network of spies working with Russia to kill President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and other top officials. And in Russia, during a celebration marking the USSR's victory over Germany in World War II, Russia's president again drew parallels between that fight against fascism and the war in Ukraine. We hear from Russians who attended the event.

Sign up for State of the World+ to listen sponsor-free and support the work of NPR journalists. Visit plus.npr.org
item.content:encoded:
Ukraine uncovers what they say was a sophisticated network of spies working with Russia to kill President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and other top officials. And in Russia, during a celebration marking the USSR's victory over Germany in World War II, Russia's president again drew parallels between that fight against fascism and the war in Ukraine. We hear from Russians who attended the event.

item.dc:creator: Joanna Kakissis

item.title: Luis Rubiales faces sexual assault trial for unsolicited kiss at World Cup
item.description: The case against the ex-Spanish soccer federation head who kissed player Jenni Hermoso without consent is going to trial, a judge ruled. Three others will be tried for allegedly pressuring Hermoso.
item.content:encoded:
The case against the ex-Spanish soccer federation head who kissed player Jenni Hermoso without consent is going to trial, a judge ruled. Three others will be tried for allegedly pressuring Hermoso.

(Image credit: Bernat Armangue)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: Barron Trump will serve as a Florida delegate at the GOP convention
item.description: Barron Trump, who turned 18 in March, has largely been kept out of the spotlight — until now. His name appears on a list of delegates for Florida at the Republican National Convention in July.
item.content:encoded:
Barron Trump, who turned 18 in March, has largely been kept out of the spotlight — until now. His name appears on a list of delegates for Florida at the Republican National Convention in July.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Jeongyoon Han

item.title: RFK Jr. is not alone. More than a billion people have parasitic worms
item.description: Presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. spoke about a time when, as he put it, "A worm ... got into my brain and ate a portion of it and then died." Here's a global perspective on these worms.
item.content:encoded:
Presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. spoke about a time when, as he put it, "A worm ... got into my brain and ate a portion of it and then died." Here's a global perspective on these worms.

(Image credit: Michael M. Santiago)
item.dc:creator: Gabrielle Emanuel

item.title: Their batteries hurt the environment, but EVs still beat gas cars. Here's why
item.description: NPR listeners wrote to ask whether the environmental harm from building EVs "cancels out" the cars' climate benefits. Experts say the answer is clear.
item.content:encoded:
NPR listeners wrote to ask whether the environmental harm from building EVs "cancels out" the cars' climate benefits. Experts say the answer is clear.

(Image credit: Emmet Livingstone)
item.dc:creator: Camila Domonoske

item.title: Their first baby came with medical debt. These Illinois parents won't have another.
item.description: Millions of new parents in the U.S. are swamped by medical debt during and after pregnancy, forcing many to cut back on food, clothing, and other essentials.
item.content:encoded: Millions of new parents in the U.S. are swamped by medical debt during and after pregnancy, forcing many to cut back on food, clothing, and other essentials.
item.dc:creator: Noam Levey

item.title: Nigeria has detained a journalist who reported on corruption in a widening crackdown
item.description: Investigative journalist Daniel Ojukwu has been arrested by police and held without charge for over a week, drawing criticism from advocacy groups over a worsening climate for independent journalism.
item.content:encoded: Investigative journalist Daniel Ojukwu has been arrested by police and held without charge for over a week, drawing criticism from advocacy groups over a worsening climate for independent journalism.
item.dc:creator: Emmanuel Akinwotu

item.title: Miss USA and Miss Teen USA resign days apart, casting a spotlight on the organization
item.description: Miss USA Noelia Voigt and Miss Teen USA UmaSofia Srivastava stepped down, citing mental health and personal values. They are the latest to depart the organization, which is no stranger to controversy.
item.content:encoded:
Miss USA Noelia Voigt and Miss Teen USA UmaSofia Srivastava stepped down, citing mental health and personal values. They are the latest to depart the organization, which is no stranger to controversy.

(Image credit: Craig Barritt)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: Judge in hush money trial denies Trump's second request for a mistrial
item.description: New York Judge Juan Merchan on Thursday denied the attempt to toss out the trial following two days of testimony from adult film star Stormy Daniels.
item.content:encoded:
New York Judge Juan Merchan on Thursday denied the attempt to toss out the trial following two days of testimony from adult film star Stormy Daniels.

(Image credit: Elizabeth Williams)
item.dc:creator: Ximena Bustillo
